Directory
=========

### Departments

* [Administration](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/city-administration/ "City Administration")
* [Police Department](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/police-department/ "Abernathy Police Department")
* [Volunteer Fire Department](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/volunteer-fire-department/ "Volunteer Fire Department")

* [City Library](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/library/ "Abernathy City Library")
* [Public Works](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/public-works/ "Public Works")
* [Municipal Court](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/court/ "Municipal Court")

#### City of Abernathy

PO Box 310 • 811 Avenue D  
Abernathy, TX 79311

Phone: [(806) 298-2546](tel:8062982546)

Hours:  
Monday – Thursday, 7:00 am – 5:00 pm  
Friday, 8:00 am – 12:00 noon
